text: @ProjectLincoln @realDonaldTrump The POS POTUS and his chicken sh*t administration have completely tanked my industry along with others with their Covid19 response and inaction.  This added to the lives lost/forever changed. This moron should be have been locked up already... we’d be in a much better place now
